entities.name: potters
entities.description: The Potters are mentioned as being related to Harry. They are referred to as 'their son' by the whisperers.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the son of the Potters and is also referred to as Mr Dursley's nephew.

entities.name: mr dursley
entities.description: Mr Dursley is a character who is worried about the mention of the Potter family. He is concerned that his nephew Harry might be in danger.

entities.name: mrs dursley
entities.description: Mrs Dursley is mentioned as being upset by any mention of her sister, who is presumably the mother of Harry Potter.

entities.name: harvey
entities.description: Harvey is mentioned as a possible name for Mr Dursley's nephew instead of Harry.

entities.name: harold
entities.description: Harold is mentioned as another possible name for Mr Dursley's nephew instead of Harry.

relationships.description: Mr Dursley is the uncle of Harry Potter. This relationship is mentioned when Mr Dursley thinks about his nephew's safety.
